regen.absent_element: situation of logging unauthorized access attempts
regen.new_specification: Unauthorized access attempts must be recorded separately in the system log for further review and potential investigation.
Unauthorized access attempts should be logged to ensure security and accountability.
The System must log any unauthorized access attempts to records, creating an entry in the audit trail.

label: Unauthorised attempts to access cases must be logged in the audit trail.
absence: action of logging of unauthorised attempts to access
